DataElement.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Ability to Think and Solve Day-to-day Problems Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response about a subject's ability, during the past week, to think and solve day to day problems.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Ability to Think and Solve Day-to-day Problems
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores._At some point in a given period of time._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about an individual's ability to think and solve day-to-day problems.
